'''''"Take That, You Overblown Mist Flower!"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat a [[Cryo Regisvine]] without destroying its corolla weak point.

==Gameplay Notes==
*Also unlocks if a teammate clears the condition during Co-Op Mode.
